group.label: Risk management
group.comment: Configure risk settings to help identify orders that require review and prevent fraud. These rules should match your risk rules defined in your Customer Area.

field.label: Send additional risk data
field.comment: If enabled, additional risk data will be sent with every payment request. To learn more about risk management, refer to Adyen documentation.

field.label: Collect data outside of checkout
field.comment: If enabled, additional data will be collected to detect fraud outside the checkout page. To learn more about data collection to detect fraud, refer to Adyen documentation.

field.label: Manual review status
field.tooltip: This status will be triggered for an order when Adyen notifies your Adobe Commerce module that the payment has been flagged for manual review. If you did not set up manual reviews or do not want a separate status, skip this configuration.

field.label: Manual review accepted status
field.tooltip: Only relevant if you do not have an action defined when you accept a manual review. This status will be triggered when a MANUL_REVIEW_ACCEPT webhook is received from Adyen. If you have already asked Adyen to set an action for this, like a capture, or don't want a separate status for this, skip this configuration.
